basics.name: Timothy Everett Adams
basics.label: Graduate Research Assistant
basics.summary: A graduate research assistant specializing in control systems and optimization.

work.name: DECAR Group
work.summary: Conduct research on the interpretation of optimization algorithms through the lens of control theory.

awards.title: Canada Graduate Scholarship - Master's program (CGS-M)
awards.awarder: Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council (NSERC)
awards.summary: Scholarship to support graduate students in a Master's program that demonstrate a high standard of achievement in undergraduate and early graduate studies.

awards.title: British Association Medal
awards.summary: Graduation medal awarded for achieving the highest academic standing in the graduating class for the Department of Mechanical Engineering.

publications.name: Zur Elektrody/namik bewegter Körper
publications.summary: It concerned an interpretation of the Michelson–Morley experiment and the properties of light and time. Special relativity incorporates the principle that the speed of light is the same for all inertial observers regardless of the state of motion of the source.

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
